sqlXml.name: tb_dict_info
sqlXml.insert: INSERT INTO tb_dict_info (id, dict_name, dict_key, dict_value, dict_before_id, create_time, update_time, create_user, status) VALUES (#{id}, #{dictName}, #{dictKey}, #{dictValue}, #{dictBeforeId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{status})
sqlXml.update: update tb_dict_info set status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
update tb_dict_info set dict_name = #{dictName}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
